import React from "react"; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import CardGroup from 'react-bootstrap/CardGroup'; import BestDeals from '../../components/Best-deals/bestDeals'; import { ticketsFetchData } from '../../redux/search/tickets/actions'; import { airportsFetchData } from '../../redux/search/airports/actions'; import { setSelectedFlightInfo, setTotalPrice } from '../../redux/user/actions'; class CardsCarousel extends React.Component { static propTypes = { ticketsFetchData: PropTypes.func.isRequired, tickets: PropTypes.array.isRequired, setTotalPrice: PropTypes.func.isRequired, setSelectedFlightInfo: PropTypes.func.isRequired, classes: PropTypes.object.isRequired, airports: PropTypes.array.isRequired, airportsFetchData: PropTypes.func.isRequired, }; constructor() { super(); this.state = { showBestDeals: false } } onClick(e, values) { e.preventDefault(); this.setState({showBestDeals: !this.state.showBestDeals}); this.props.ticketsFetchData('/search-request', values); return this.props.tickets; } render() { return (

Cheap flight offers**

Riga From Minsk $ 70 Warsaw From Kiev $ 60 Vilnius From Moscow $ 65 Kiev From Minsk $ 65 Kiev From Tallinn $ 35 Amsterdam From Warsaw $ 40 {this.state.showBestDeals && }
) } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ userRequest: state.user.request, tickets: state.searchPage.tickets.items, ticketsHasErrored: state.searchPage.tickets.hasErrored, ticketsIsLoading: state.searchPage.tickets.isLoading, airports: state.searchPage.airports.items, airportsHaveErrored: state.searchPage.airports.hasErrored, }) const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ ticketsFetchData: (url, values) => dispatch(ticketsFetchData(url, values)), setTotalPrice: price => dispatch(setTotalPrice(price)), setSelectedFlightInfo: flightInfo => dispatch(setSelectedFlightInfo(flightInfo)), airportsFetchData: url => dispatch(airportsFetchData(url)), }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(CardsCarousel);
